H0.text: An inclined plane is a type of simple machine called a ramp.

H1.text: Extension plane is the type of simple machine that a ramp is called.

H2.text: An allow plane is a type of simple machine called a ramp.

H3.text: Rough plane is a type of simple machine called a ramp.

A4.text: The inclined plane is one of the six classical simple machines defined by Renaissance scientists.

A5.text: An inclined plane is also known as a ramp.
